name: Test Game (David Tsarskykh)
description:
Hi everyone, I recently started making this game!  I have done 3 levels so far and would like to know if I should continue or not?  In any case, I will continue :) But you can write ideas for the levels in the comments, as well as errors (if you found them), I will be happy to hear each comment, and if you saw this post, please leave a comment and a 5 star rating, thanks!

  Everyone who liked the game, you can subscribe to my profile on itch.io. I will post my game, demo and full version here!  Well, while you read this post, I am making a game!

 Here's a little bit about this game!

 One day, or was it a night?  I ended up wondering where I was...

 It was very dark and scary, I was in a suit of knight armor,

 (Which I wasn’t wearing before). I thought it was a dream, but everything was so

 real that I had goosebumps. I decided to look around but there was darkness around.

 After about 20 minutes, I saw something that looked like a tower or a large rectangular stone, I tried to jump on it, and a miracle happened!  I jumped very high, like as high as the moon, and moved on...

 Some kind of demon is running at me, very bright!  He blinded me in this darkness, but I pulled out a sword and stuck it right in its head.

 Then I met a couple more of these creatures as well as a sorcerer!

 He created some sort of fireball, and it flew right at me, I had no choice but to beat them back with a sword!  And it worked... The ball flew into the sorcerer

 and it exploded!

 2 weeks have passed...

 I am very scared and cold, but I will not stop.

 3 weeks passed ...

 Flying creatures attacked me!  One bit me, but the wound is almost healed, I must go further.
